original_solution_mapping.L1: There will be 3500 gold coins / 5 chest= <<3500/5=700>>700 gold coins in every chest.
original_solution_mapping.L2: So, there will be 500 silver coins / 5 chests = <<500/5=100>>100 silver coins in each chest.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Then, the number of bronze coins is double the number of silver coins, so there are 2 * 500 = <<2*500=1000>>1000 bronze coins.
original_solution_mapping.L4: So there will be 1000 bronze coins / 5 chests = <<1000/5=200>>200 bronze coins in each chest.
original_solution_mapping.L5: Finally, the total number of coins in every chest will be 700 gold coins + 100 silver coins + 200 bronze coins = <<700+100+200=1000>>1000 coins.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 3457.
    Returns: the total number of coins in each chest.
    """
    # L1
    total_gold_coins = 3500 # He has 3500 gold coins
    num_chests = 5 # across 5 chests
    gold_coins_per_chest = total_gold_coins / num_chests

    # L2
    total_silver_coins = 500 # 500 silver coins
    silver_coins_per_chest = total_silver_coins / num_chests

    # L3
    bronze_multiplier = 2 # twice as many bronze coins as silver
    total_bronze_coins = bronze_multiplier * total_silver_coins

    # L4
    bronze_coins_per_chest = total_bronze_coins / num_chests

    # L5
    total_coins_per_chest = gold_coins_per_chest + silver_coins_per_chest + bronze_coins_per_chest

    # FA
    answer = total_coins_per_chest
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: There will be {total_gold_coins} gold coins / {num_chests} chest= <<{total_gold_coins}/{num_chests}={gold_coins_per_chest}>>{gold_coins_per_chest} gold coins in every chest.
So, there will be {total_silver_coins} silver coins / {num_chests} chests = <<{total_silver_coins}/{num_chests}={silver_coins_per_chest}>>{silver_coins_per_chest} silver coins in each chest.

Then, the number of bronze coins is double the number of silver coins, so there are {bronze_multiplier} * {total_silver_coins} = <<{bronze_multiplier}*{total_silver_coins}={total_bronze_coins}>>{total_bronze_coins} bronze coins.
So there will be {total_bronze_coins} bronze coins / {num_chests} chests = <<{total_bronze_coins}/{num_chests}={bronze_coins_per_chest}>>{bronze_coins_per_chest} bronze coins in each chest.

Finally, the total number of coins in every chest will be {gold_coins_per_chest} gold coins + {silver_coins_per_chest} silver coins + {bronze_coins_per_chest} bronze coins = <<{gold_coins_per_chest}+{silver_coins_per_chest}+{bronze_coins_per_chest}={total_coins_per_chest}>>{total_coins_per_chest} coins.
